name: Kia Tiki! | Go Fetch!
description:
Explore this beautiful little garden while following the tasks given by your grandma. Learn about native plants, flowers, tools and more as she explains a little more with each completed quest

WARNING: Please do not approach the Moa, the game may crash!

Credits:

- Kane (Aka Pacer) - Programmer, Artist
- Florence (Aka seaworthywhale) - Artist, Designer, Writer
- Carl Leducq - Producer, Marketing

Kaitautoko Māori | Māori Support:

Ngā mihi nui ki a kōutou kātoa ngā Rangatira who kindly contributed to and guided us in this mahi. We acknowledge and thank them, their ancestors and their warmth and openness in sharing their wisdom, knowledge and stories. Mauriora!

- Aroha Healion
- Tihikura Hohaia
- Barry Soutar
- Hermione McCallum-Haire
- Niva Kay
- The rest of the Regenerate Game Jam team.

Assets:
- Ue4 assets ALS (advanced locomotion System)
- Tropical Jungle Pack (foliage)
- CC3 (Character Creator 3)
- Font: Reglisse

Made as part of the REGENERATE Game Jam Matariki, June 2022
